Punish.name: Wheel of Punishment
Punish.desc: It is time to face justice use the wheel of judgement.

Ping.name: Ping
Ping.desc: Command Jordan uses for server to client feedback.

Hook.name: Hook
Hook.desc: Returns a hook in the channel.

Weather.name: Weather
Weather.desc: Returns the weather in the channel.

Purge.name: Purge
Purge.desc: Clears a specified number of messages.

Quote.name: Quote
Quote.desc: Send random or specific quote in chat.

Forgive.name: Forgive
Forgive.desc: Take someone out of timeout in chat.

Cleanse.name: Cleanse
Cleanse.desc: Take everyone out of timeout in chat.

Shambles.name: Shambles
Shambles.desc: Look at the current cryptocurreny market.

Add Role.name: Add Role
Add Role.desc: Add a role to a user in chat

Remove Role.name: Remove Role
Remove Role.desc: Remove a role from a user in chat

Holiday.name: Holiday
Holiday.desc: Celebrate a holiday with the chat

Balance.name: Balance
Balance.desc: Check yours or another users balance

Add Balance.name: Add Balance
Add Balance.desc: Add money to a users balance
